name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou!: Sammy Revolution 2
overview: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! - Sammy Revolution 2 (aka Pachisuro! Sammy Revolution 2) is a pachi-slot (gambling machine) game that features a perfect recreation of 6 gambling machines (Japan 2, Melon Panic, Royal Bar 2, Wappers, Kappappa, Binbin Kamisama, ) with different levels of zoom.
